sailpoint.object

Class CloudAccessObjectUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.object.CloudAccessObjectUtil

  • public class CloudAccessObjectUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to read/delete the associations between CloudAccessGroup, CloudAccessRole, and CloudAccessScope.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudAccessObjectUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • getGroupRoles

        public static java.util.List<CloudAccessRole> getGroupRoles(SailPointContext ctx,
                                                            java.lang.String cloudAccessGroupId)
                                                     throws GeneralException
        Return the list of CloudAccessRole objects which are referenced by a CloudAccessGroup
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        cloudAccessGroupId - the id of the CloudAccessGroup for which the roles should be returned
        Returns:
        list of CloudAccessRole objects which are referenced by a CloudAccessGroup. Will return an empty list, instead of null, to indicate no roles.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getGroupRoleScopes

        public static java.util.List<CloudAccessScope> getGroupRoleScopes(SailPointContext ctx,
                                                                  java.lang.String cloudAccessGroupId,
                                                                  java.lang.String cloudAccessRoleId)
                                                           throws GeneralException
        Given the ids of the CloudAcessGroup and CloudAccessRole, return the associated CloudAccessScope objects.
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        cloudAccessGroupId - the id of the CloudAccessGroup for which the scopes should be returned
        cloudAccessRoleId - the id of the CloudAccessRole for which the roles should be returned
        Returns:
        list of CloudAccessScope objects which are referenced by the given CloudAcessRole, which is under the given CloudAccessGroup. Will return an empty list, instead of null, to indicate no scopes.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • deleteGroupRoles

        public static void deleteGroupRoles(SailPointContext ctx,
                                    CloudAccessGroup group,
                                    java.util.List<CloudAccessRole> rolesToDelete)
                             throws GeneralException
        Remove the relationships between the given CloudAccessGroup and the given list of CloudAccessRole objects.
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        group - the CloudAccessGroup to remove references from
        rolesToDelete - the CloudAccessRole objects which the CloudAccessGroup should no longer reference
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • deleteGroupRoleScopesAll

        public static void deleteGroupRoleScopesAll(SailPointContext ctx,
                                            CloudAccessGroup group,
                                            CloudAccessRole role)
                                     throws GeneralException
        Remove the relationships between the given CloudAccessGroup/CloudAccessRole pair and their current CloudAccessScope objects.
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        group - the CloudAccessGroup which the role is under
        role - the CloudAccessRole from which to remove all of its CloudScopeObject references
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • deleteGroupRoleScopes

        public static void deleteGroupRoleScopes(SailPointContext ctx,
                                         CloudAccessGroup group,
                                         CloudAccessRole role,
                                         java.util.List<CloudAccessScope> scopesToDelete)
                                  throws GeneralException
        Remove the relationships between the given CloudAccessGroup/CloudAccessRole pair and the given CloudAccessScope objects.
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        group - the CloudAccessGroup which the role is under
        role - the CloudAccessRole from which to remove all of its CloudScopeObject references
        scopesToDelete - the list of scopes to remove references to
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        public static void deleteGroupAll(SailPointContext ctx,
                                  CloudAccessGroup group)
                           throws GeneralException
        Remove all references to the given CloudAccessRoleGroup
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        group - the CloudAccessGroup that will no longer be referenced to/from
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • deleteUngroupedRole

        public static boolean deleteUngroupedRole(SailPointContext ctx,
                                          CloudAccessRole role)
                                   throws GeneralException
        If the given CloudAccessRole is not a member of any group, then remove all knowledge of it from database. Otherwise, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        ctx - database context
        role - the CloudAccessRole to delete if it is not part of a group
        Returns:
        true if the role is ungrouped role that is deleted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getCloudAccessGroupTypes

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getCloudAccessGroupTypes(SailPointContext ctx,
                                                                       java.lang.String managedAttrVal)
                                                                throws GeneralException
        When a ManagedAttribute value is known and the cloudType for an associated CloudAccessGroup is needed. This method will first get the respective CloudAccessGroup using a ManagedAttribute value. If there is an associated CloudAccessGroup, return the cloudType from that CloudAccessGroup. Also check related CloudAccessRole for cloudType and add to the Set to be returned.
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        managedAttrVal -
        Returns:
        Set for String cloudTypes for an associated CloudAccessGroup
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getCloudAccessRoleType

        public static java.lang.String getCloudAccessRoleType(SailPointContext ctx,
                                                      java.lang.String managedAttrVal)
                                               throws GeneralException
        When a ManagedAttribute value is known and the cloudType for an associated CloudAccessRole is needed. This method will first get the respective CloudAccessRole using a ManagedAttribute value. If there is an associated CloudAccessRole, return the cloudType from that CloudAccessRole
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        managedAttrVal -
        Returns:
        String value of the cloudType for an associated CloudAccessRole
        Throws:
        GeneralException
